title: Arvocap Asset Managers
content:
Team Member
Dr. David Mutonga
CHAIRMAN
About 
Dr.
 
David
As the Chairman of the Board at ArvoCap Asset Managers, Mr. Mutonga is the unwavering leader guiding our corporate governance, strategic vision, and overall direction. With a distinguished career marked by wisdom and foresight, he brings a commitment of excellence that propels Arvocap to new heights. Mr. Mutonga boasts 25 years of active investment experience in Kenya’s Capital Markets, specializing in Money Markets, Listed Equities, and Government Securities. His role on the Board adds the valuable perspective of an investor, contributing insights into value creation, risk appetite, and product diversification.
Mr. Mutonga holds a Bachelor of Medicine & Surgery from the University of Nairobi and an MSC in Applied Epidemiology from Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology. With over 18 years of experience in public health practice at national, regional, and international levels, he currently serves as the Kenya team lead for the USAID-funded Infectious Diseases Detection and Surveillance Project and the Kenya country representative for ICF International.
After a brief period as a medical/clinical practitioner, his rich tour of national service includes a stint as a District Medical Officer, and later head of the Division of Disease Surveillance and Outbreak Response in the Ministry of Health, Kenya. He has also worked with major international organizations such the WHO, the U.S. CDC and Palladium in various African countries and beyond, including South Sudan, Congo, Uganda, South Africa, U.S.A and Thailand. He brings to the board a great vision on strategic preparedness, organizational stability and mission driven agility.
Arvocap Asset Managers

title: Arvocap Asset Managers
content:
Arvocap Asset Managers
About Us
Our Mission
To empower investors by creating, managing, and diversifying their wealth through innovative financial solutions and opportunities.
Our Vision
To be at the forefront of financial innovation, harnessing the power of technology and market insights to continuously enhance our services
Our Values
We leverage technology and market insights to empower investors with solutions for wealth creation and management.
WHO ARE WE
Founder's
 Note
Introducing ArvoCap Asset Managers Ltd: Our journey stems from a shared vision for investment excellence. Founded with a commitment to prioritize our clients’ interests, we stand as your trusted partner today. Guided by integrity, innovation, and collaboration, our skilled team offers tailored solutions to meet your unique needs. With a diverse expertise, we provide a comprehensive suite of services, ensuring we adapt to the ever-changing financial landscape.
Committed to ongoing innovation and service excellence, we thank our clients and partners for their trust. Together, we navigate the complexities of wealth management, seizing opportunities and mitigating risks. Join us as we redefine wealth management together, one success story at a time.
Monicah Mwaniki, Wilson Wariari, Preeyanka Shah & Atul Shah Founders
The Arvocap Team

Our Location
8th Floor, Reliable Towers
Working days
Mon to Fri - 09:00am To 05:00pm
CONTACT US
Happy to Answer All Your Questions
We at ArvoCap aim to be a storied investment vehicle that takes investors from one floor of their investment journey to the next by answering one simple question: what is the investors motivation to invest? Our goal is to walk investors through this journey via innovative investment solutions that empower them to build, grow, preserve and distribute wealth.

Arvocap Asset Managers
Events
Upcoming Events
November
29
The Men's Wellness Summit – 2025 Edition
KES 
7,500
The Waterfront Karen
Now in its second year, the Men's Wellness Summit 2025 brings together visionary leaders, entrepreneurs, professionals, and everyday men for a transformative experience dedicated to mental wellness, growth, and purposeful living.

Last year’s debut, themed “Let It Grow”, sparked raw and honest conversations around manhood, pressure, and the silent struggles men carry. It created a brotherhood that continues to inspire.

This year, under the theme “Soaring High,” the Summit takes the conversation higher—challenging men to rise above limitations, embrace vulnerability as strength, and unlock the freedom that comes with balanced health, wealth, and purpose.

title: Arvocap Asset Managers
content:
Team Member
Atul Shah
CO-FOUNDER
About 
Atul
 
Shah
With over 39 years of experience in various services including strategy, M&A, Insolvency and audit and assurance. Atul has served as a lead engagement partner on numerous assignments. His expertise spans advising on acquisition strategies, conducting due diligence reviews and business valuations, managing restructuring efforts, and overseeing public and private share issues and placements. Notably, Atul has played pivotal roles as lead transaction or financial advisor in high-profile assignments, IPOs and restructuring and privatization assignments in Kenya and the region.
Atul’s experience extends beyond borders, encompassing major assignments in the oil sector in Zambia and Eastern Africa the telecoms sector in Ethiopia, Gambia, and Kenya. He has also been involved in bank restructuring and privatizations in various countries in Kenya, Ghana, Ethiopia, and Zambia. He had extensive involvement in government ministries and state audits for the Government of South Sudan and formulated strategies for various ministries and state corporations in Africa. Atul has conducted project audits for initiatives funded by various donors in Africa.
Atul holds an MBA from Heriot-Watt University in Edinburgh, Scotland, and is a Chartered Accountant with ACCA and ICAEW. He holds the qualifications of FCPA(K), FCCA, and ACA. Atul’s professional responsibilities previously include Chairman of the PKF Africa Board, Member of the PKF International Global Council, and Director of the PKF International Africa Board. He has also served as the CEO of PKF East African firms from 2011-2018. Atul is a Partner with PKF Kenya and KLSA LLP, London. He is also a principal and founder of ABR Capital Partners which has private equity investments in London. Atul has held various trustee and senior positions in various charitable organizations and schools in Kenya. Atul enjoys reading and playing golf. With his extensive experience and impressive credentials, Atul is poised to make significant contributions to the capital markets through this fund management company.
Arvocap Asset Managers

title: Arvocap Asset Managers
content:
Team Member
Susan Mukora
INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR - HEAD OF ARC
About 
Susan
 
Mukora
As the leader of our Audit, Risk & Compliance department, Susan plays an indispensable role in safeguarding the trust and confidence of our investors & clients. With a career defined by meticulous attention to detail and an unwavering commitment to best practices in financial governance, Susan is entrusted with the critical task of ensuring that our operations align with the highest standards of transparency, risk management, and regulatory compliance.
Susan’s academic background includes a Bachelor of Commerce – Finance at the University of Nairobi, followed by an MBA in Strategic Management at the United States International University. Her academics have enriched Susan with a solid understanding of financial markets, investment instruments, and risk management principles; strategic planning, organizational leadership, and decision making; assessing complex financial data & identifying potential risks in investment portfolios, and finally, a deep understanding of regulatory compliance.
In her roles as Head of Finance, Finance Director, Financial Controller, and Audit, Risk, and Compliance Officer, Susan brings over 12 years of experience in this field, bringing detailed experience in financial strategy and operations, financial reporting, audit, compliance, and treasury management, among others.
Arvocap Asset Managers
headings: H3: INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR - HEAD OF ARC

title: Arvocap Asset Managers
content:
Team Member
Monicah Mwaniki
CO-FOUNDER, CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
About 
Monicah
 
Mwaniki
At the helm of Arvocap Asset Managers stands Monicah, a visionary leader who embodies financial acumen and strategic excellence. As the CEO, she is the driving force behind our commitment to delivering exceptional products and superior client service. Monicah’s leadership transcends conventional boundaries, shaping our investment strategies and driving us toward a prosperous financial future. With a dynamic vision, she has positioned ArvoCap as a trailblazer in the field, redefining the art of wealth management.
Her academic background includes a Master of Commerce from Strathmore University and a Bachelor of Arts from the University of Nairobi, providing her with a solid foundation in business and the arts. In addition to her degrees, she has further enriched her knowledge and skills by obtaining a Higher Diploma in IMIS (UK) and becoming a Certified Public Accountant of Kenya (CPAK) from Strathmore University. These qualifications have equipped her with a comprehensive understanding of information management systems and accounting principles, respectively.
As a member of the Institute of Certified Investment and Financial Analysts (ICIFA), she adheres to the highest standards of professionalism and ethics in her work. She also holds Chartered Institute for Securities & Investment (CISI) Level II qualifications, further testament to her commitment to continuous learning and professional development in the investment and financial services industry. With her impressive credentials and extensive experience, specifically in Fixed Income, Monicah is poised to make significant contributions to the capital markets.
Monicah brings over 14 years of experience in investment banking; servicing institutional and ultra-high-net-worth clients. She created a rapport and market connection as head of department – Fixed Income, Dyer & Blair, and formally as an associate at SIB, which aided her in closing some of the largest deals in the market, a fete that was recognised in the 2018 Investment Banking Awards.
Arvocap Asset Managers

title: Arvocap Asset Managers
content:
Team Member
Preeyanka Shah
CO-FOUNDER, CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER
About 
Preeyanka
 
Shah
Preeyanka is the guiding force behind the day-to-day intricacies that makes our organization thrive. With a career dedicated to efficiency, innovation, and a commitment to excellence, our COO ensures the smooth and precise functioning of our operational infrastructure. Her extensive experience in the financial industry, coupled with a passion for process optimization, results in the seamless delivery of services to our clients. As the driving force behind our operational success, Preeyanka plays an integral role in transforming investment strategies into tangible, client-focused results.
She holds a BSc in Economics & Finance from Cardiff Business School; Cardiff University, demonstrating her strong academic foundation in the field. Her education has been further supplemented by professional certifications such as the CISI Level I, as well as the ATS certification by NSE. These qualifications reflect her commitment to continuous learning and staying abreast of the latest developments in the financial sector.
Having over 9 years of experience in Commercial Banking (GT Bank), tailor-making offshore investment products (The Profin Group), and Private Wealth Management (Dyer & Blair Investment Bank), she leverages her extensive experience and knowledge to provide strategic direction and ensure smooth operations. Her leadership style is characterized by her dedication to client service, her strategic approach to investment, and her commitment to ethical business practices. She is passionate about helping clients achieve their financial goals and is dedicated to guiding ArvoCap Asset Managers toward continued success.
Arvocap Asset Managers

title: Arvocap Asset Managers
content:
Team Member
Wilson Wariari
CO-FOUNDER, CHIEF INVESTMENT OFFICER
About 
Wilson
 
Wariari
Better known as the driving force behind our strategic investment decisions, Wilson is the guiding light of Arvocap Asset Managers, orchestrating a symphony of financial expertise and market insight. With a deep-rooted passion for maximizing returns and navigating the complex landscape of asset management, Wilson has honed a track record of success that sets the industry standard. His vision shapes our investment strategies, driving us to deliver exceptional results for our clients.
His academic credentials include a Bachelor of Economics degree from the University of Nairobi and a postgraduate International Certificate in Corporate Finance from Columbia Business School; University of Columbia. These qualifications have provided him with a robust understanding of economics and corporate finance. In addition to his academic achievements, Wilson holds the Chartered Institute for Securities & Investment (CISI) Level III qualification, demonstrating his commitment to professional development in the investment and financial services industry. His experience spans different roles and industries, providing him with a diverse skill set and a broad perspective on the capital markets.
Wilson has worked as a derivatives trader, where he gained extensive experience in the futures and options industry across different asset classes. He also served as a business development manager for a consultancy firm, honing his skills in strategic planning and client relations. With his wealth of experience and impressive credentials, Wilson is well-positioned to make significant contributions to the capital markets.
Wilson is a seasoned professional with over 10 years of experience in derivatives and offshore trading (Futures First – Hertshten Group), Private Wealth Management, Product Development, and Research (Dyer & Blair Investment Bank), and Corporate Finance: Capital Raising, Mergers & Acquisition Advisory, Capital Restructuring, and Corporate Financial Health Check (Fiinvo Africa).
Arvocap Asset Managers
